channel.title: html5 on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in html5 on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Generating sprites with HTML5 canvas (node-canvas)
item.description: About a week ago, I posted about drawing simple shapes in HTML5. HTML5’s Canvas isn’t only useful on the client side.

item.title: Drawing a custom HTML5 shape
item.description: HTML5 is fun. I’ve meant to post about it more than I have in the past (which is 0 posts). I recently got the urge, so I want to show how to draw a heart and a star on HTML5 canvas.
